title: Textile, 1906
inscribed: attached label,"DESIGN ON POINT PAPER TO INDICATE TO JACQUARD CARD CUTTER WHER VARIOUS WARP THREADS ARE TO BE RAISED IN THE LOOM AND ACTUAL WOVEN FROM THIS PROCEDURE..SILK AND COTTON BROCATELLE."
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 130 x 63.5 cm (51 3/16 x 25 in.)
H x W x D (b): 33 x 65 cm (13 x 25 9/16 in.)
Repeat H x W (straight): 12.1 x 10.8 cm (4 3/4 x 4 1/4 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
description: A. Flowers, stems and leaves in a 17th Century-inspired design. Red on gold and red background. B. Drawing for the design on point paper.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1906.
1906. Medium: silk, cotton, paper
Technique:. Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever. 1979-9-37-a,b.
